Files and packages to import

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)

medications <- read.csv("C:/Users/ctaylor18/Documents/GitHub/GRLS_analyses/Data/medications.csv",na.strings=c ("","NA"))
vaccinations <-read.csv("C:/Users/ctaylor18/Documents/GitHub/GRLS_analyses/Data/vaccines.csv",na.strings=c ("","NA"))
#ensure all lower case
medications <- medications %>% mutate(across(where(is.character), tolower))
vaccinations <- vaccinations %>% mutate(across(where(is.character), tolower))
```
